name: part_018
file: tmp_【#つながるホロライブDAY1】hololive 3rd fes. Link Your Wish【チラ見せ】 [zkXvWvTX_BE]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_018.mov

scenes.description: Inugami Korone performs a parody of 'Airman ga Taosenai', with lyrics themed around her famous 'Ghosts 'n Goblins' (Daimakaimura) playthrough and her character items.
Transition and introduction video for the next performance unit.
Natsuiro Matsuri, Oozora Subaru, and Momosuzu Nene perform the song 'Candy-Go-Round'.

subtitles.original: 気がついたらライフもう少ししかない
subtitles.english: Before I knew it, I barely have any lives left.

subtitles.original: そしていつもそこで胃管だけ使う
subtitles.english: And as always, I end up using only my stomach tube right there.

subtitles.original: USE ITEM
subtitles.english: USE ITEM

subtitles.original: 諦めずにエイアムまでたどり着くけれど
subtitles.english: I make it all the way to A-M without giving up, but...

subtitles.original: すぐに残機なくなる
subtitles.english: I lose my lives in no time.

subtitles.original: GAME OVER
subtitles.english: GAME OVER

subtitles.original: イフシールドがあれば楽にエイアムは倒せるけど
subtitles.english: If only I had the Leaf Shield, I could beat A-M easily, but...

subtitles.original: 何回やっても 何回やっても
subtitles.english: No matter how many times I try, no matter how many times I try,

subtitles.original: ウッドマンが倒せないよ
subtitles.english: I can't defeat Woodman!

subtitles.original: 落ちるこの葉は何回やっても避けれない
subtitles.english: I can't dodge those falling leaves, no matter how many times I try.

subtitles.original: 後ろに下がって距離をとってもいずれは距離を詰められる
subtitles.english: Even if I back away to keep my distance, he eventually closes in on me.

subtitles.original: タイムレンヤも試してみたけどあいつのジャンプは潜れない
subtitles.english: I tried using Time Stopper, but I can't slip under his jumps.

subtitles.original: だから次は絶対勝つために僕は胃管だけは最後まで取っておく
subtitles.english: So next time, to make sure I win, I'll save my stomach tube until the very end!

subtitles.original: アイテム２号があれば楽に向こうの岸まで行けるけど
subtitles.english: If I had Item 2, I could easily get to the other side, but...

subtitles.original: 何回やっても 何回やっても
subtitles.english: No matter how many times I try, no matter how many times I try,

subtitles.original: エイアムが倒せないよ
subtitles.english: I can't defeat A-M!

subtitles.original: あの竜巻は何回やっても避けれない
subtitles.english: I can't dodge those tornadoes, no matter how many times I try.

subtitles.original: 後ろに回って撃ち続けてもいずれは風に飛ばされる
subtitles.english: Even if I get behind him and keep shooting, I eventually get blown away by the wind.

subtitles.original: タイムレンヤも試してみたけど竜巻相手じゃ意味がない
subtitles.english: I tried using Time Stopper, but it's useless against tornadoes.

subtitles.original: だから次は絶対勝つために僕は胃管だけは最後まで取っておく
subtitles.english: So next time, to make sure I win, I'll save my stomach tube until the very end!

subtitles.original: 倒せないよ
subtitles.english: I can't beat him...

subtitles.original: みんな！いっぱいっぱい指ありがとう！
subtitles.english: Everyone! Thank you for all the fingers!

subtitles.original: こんなに指がもらえるなんて、ほんと幸せです！
subtitles.english: I'm so happy to receive this many fingers!

subtitles.original: みんなが痛みに耐えて切り落としてくれた指、大事にするからねー！
subtitles.english: I'll treasure the fingers you all endured the pain to cut off for me!

subtitles.original: ありがとー！
subtitles.english: Thank you!

subtitles.original: 夏色まつり
subtitles.english: Natsuiro Matsuri

subtitles.original: 大空スバル
subtitles.english: Oozora Subaru

subtitles.original: 桃鈴ねね
subtitles.english: Momosuzu Nene

subtitles.original: Moonlight Merry-go-round, Candy-Go-Round, Ready-go-round
subtitles.english: Moonlight Merry-go-round, Candy-Go-Round, Ready-go-round

subtitles.original: 夢のようなスピードでエスコート
subtitles.english: Escorting you at a dream-like speed.

subtitles.original: 時の流れはいつでもゆっくり
subtitles.english: Time always flows slowly.

subtitles.original: だけどハートの動くスピード
subtitles.english: But the speed at which the heart moves,

subtitles.original: 気まぐれは
subtitles.english: is so fickle.

subtitles.original: 聞かせてよ この場所へ
subtitles.english: Let me hear you, so it reaches

subtitles.original: ちゃんと届くように
subtitles.english: this place clearly.

subtitles.original: 君の Clap Clap Clap
subtitles.english: Your clap, clap, clap,

subtitles.original: Everybody clap hands up!
subtitles.english: Everybody, clap your hands!

subtitles.original: Good story
subtitles.english: Good story

subtitles.original: Moonlight Merry-go-round, Candy-Go-Round, Ready-go-round, 夢のようなスピードで飛び立とう
subtitles.english: Moonlight Merry-go-round, Candy-Go-Round, Ready-go-round, Let's take off at a dream-like speed!

subtitles.original: 歌に乗り込めばいけるんだ
subtitles.english: If we jump into the song, we can make it.

subtitles.original: ハイスピリズム止められない
subtitles.english: This high-speed rhythm is unstoppable!

subtitles.original: さあ Moonlight Merry-go-round, Candy-Go-Round, パラレルは始まりのベルが鳴り響く夜に
subtitles.english: Now, Moonlight Merry-go-round, Candy-Go-Round, on this night where the bell of the parallel world rings out...

subtitles.original: 迎えに行くから
subtitles.english: ...I'm coming to pick you up!

subtitles.original: 同じビートで一つのナンバー奏でよう
subtitles.english: Let's play one song with the same beat.

subtitles.original: 奏でよう
subtitles.english: Let's play it!

subtitles.original: ハートを1ミリでも動かせば
subtitles.english: If you move your heart even just a millimeter,

subtitles.original: 奇跡起こす大きな一歩に繋がるから
subtitles.english: it'll lead to a big step that creates a miracle.

subtitles.original: つまらない時はワクワクを
subtitles.english: When things are boring,

subtitles.original: リリックスして
subtitles.english: turn your excitement into lyrics.

subtitles.original: つまらない時はワクワクを
subtitles.english: When things are boring,

subtitles.original: リリックスして
subtitles.english: turn your excitement into lyrics.
